plot: THE OTHER GUY is a documentary short series. It focuses on the athlete indirectly responsible for, perhaps even embarrassed by an iconic moment which a now legendary athlete is best remembered.
title: The Other Guy
plot_es: THE OTHER GUY is a documentary short series. It focuses on the athlete indirectly responsible for, perhaps even embarrassed by an iconic moment which a now legendary athlete is best remembered.
plot_en: THE OTHER GUY is a documentary short series. It focuses on the athlete indirectly responsible for, perhaps even embarrassed by an iconic moment which a now legendary athlete is best remembered.
